description: Hedge maple (Acer campestre) is an amazing tree species. It stands out with its magnificent red colouring, making it a great ornamental choice for any garden. This species is also super versatile, with their dense and low formation growing into large mounds or natural hedges along borders. As it ages, it becomes a larger, round-headed tree, perfect for providing some shade on hot summer days! Furthermore, these trees are not particular fussy when it comes to soil. Lastly, hedge maple is a low-maintenance species that is fast-growing and, once established, extremely tough.
